item.title: Limit Egress/External Traffic
item.description: Sometimes services are only available from outside the OpenShift cluster (like external API) which must be reached. Part 7 of OpenShift 4 and Service Mesh takes care and explains how to control the egress or external traffic. All operations have been successdully tested on OpenShift 4.3.
